function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential presence of SARS-CoV-2 in unfiltered sewage samples","Impact":"Risk of spreading SARS-CoV-2 through sewage contamination","Mitigation":"Implement proper filtration and disinfection measures for sewage treatment","Technologies":"Polyether sulfone membrane filtration, viral precipitation with polyethylene glycol and NaCl, RNA extraction with TRIzol reagent","People":"Public health workers, sewage treatment plant operators","Owner":"Public health authorities, sewage treatment plant management"},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 signal in PEG-precipitated filtrate fraction","Impact":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through contaminated filtrate","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough disinfection of the filtrate and implement safety protocols for handling","Technologies":"Viral precipitation with polyethylene glycol and NaCl, RNA extraction with TRIzol reagent","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Research institution, laboratory management"},{"Description":"Presence of viral signal in solid materials on the filter","Impact":"Risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 during handling of solid materials","Mitigation":"Implement proper disinfection and handling protocols for solid materials, and use personal protective equipment","Technologies":"RNA extraction with TRIzol reagent, solid material disinfection","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Research institution, laboratory management"}]}
